courses.title: Chelsea Gray – Passing
courses.description: Master the fundamentals of passing at an elite level. Learn proper footwork, dribble pickups, peripheral passing, and how to deliver accurate passes under pressure.

drills.name: Passing off Exchange
drills.description: Focuses on using dribble exchanges to generate passing opportunities. Emphasis on timing, tempo, and accuracy under pressure.

drills.name: Exchange Through the Legs
drills.description: Develops ball control and the ability to transition between dribble moves and passes using through-the-legs exchange footwork.

drills.name: Exchange Behind the Back
drills.description: Improves behind-the-back exchanges to create passing angles and deception during live actions.

drills.name: Passing off the Dribble
drills.description: Teaches making accurate passes directly off the dribble with minimal gather time.

drills.name: 3 Dribble Exchange
drills.description: Chains multiple dribble transitions before passing. Emphasizes creativity and ball control.

drills.name: Step Through Passing
drills.description: Uses step-through footwork to create passing lanes against defenders.

drills.name: Step Through, Spin Outs
drills.description: Combines step-throughs and spin moves to maintain balance while delivering passes.

drills.name: Speed Stop, Step Through, Spin Outs
drills.description: Adds tempo changes and controlled pivots to improve decision-making when defenders trap.

drills.name: 2 Ball Speed Stop, Step Through, Spin Outs
drills.description: A two-ball version that improves ambidexterity and ball control during footwork sequences.

drills.name: Pocket Dribble Passing
drills.description: Develops pocket dribble control and passing accuracy from tight windows.

drills.name: Behind the Back from Pocket Dribble
drills.description: Combines pocket dribble with behind-the-back manipulation before passing.

drills.name: Peripheral Passing
drills.description: Trains reading targets without looking directly at them and passing from non-traditional angles.

drills.name: Double Exchange Peripheral Passing
drills.description: Adds misdirection and speed with double exchanges before throwing peripheral passes.

drills.name: Double Exchange Behind the Back Passing
drills.description: Uses double behind-the-back exchanges to challenge ball control and passing timing.

drills.name: Double Exchange Sequence Behind the Back Passing
drills.description: Full sequence combining multiple exchanges behind the back before delivering the pass.

courses.title: Marina Mabrey – Stationary Ball Handling
courses.description: Develop elite-level tight handle, manipulation moves, and ball control from a stationary position. Build confidence with advanced dribble variations.

drills.name: Pound Dribbles
drills.description: Repetitive pound dribbles to build hand speed and ball control.

drills.name: Pocket Dribbles
drills.description: Works on dribbling in tight spaces by keeping the ball in the hip pocket.

drills.name: Push 1,2 Manipulation Series
drills.description: Teaches manipulation of defenders using rhythmic dribbles.

drills.name: Push, Pull Pocket Dribbles
drills.description: Mixes forward and backward pocket dribbles for control and deception.

drills.name: 1,2 Manipulation Cross
drills.description: Uses rhythmic dribbles leading into crossovers for misdirection.

drills.name: 1,2 Pocket Thrus
drills.description: Practices transferring the ball through tight spaces with quick hands.

drills.name: 1,2 Pocket Behinds
drills.description: Dribble manipulation leading into behind-the-back transfers.

drills.name: 1,2 Triple Exchange
drills.description: High-speed sequence combining three types of exchanges.

drills.name: Pocket Drops
drills.description: Helps create separation with sudden pocket dribble drops.

drills.name: Drop Thrus
drills.description: Combines drop footwork with tight dribble control.

drills.name: Split Behinds
drills.description: Uses split steps and behind-the-back dribbles for rhythm and deception.

drills.name: Continuous Drop Thrus
drills.description: Repetitive drill for continuous footwork + pocket dribble flow.

drills.name: Punch Drag
drills.description: Ball manipulation through punch dribble and drag steps.

drills.name: Drag Dribble
drills.description: Pulls the ball backward and changes pace to simulate sudden stops.

courses.title: Jordin Canada – Full Court Ball Handling
courses.description: Develop full-court handling skills with pace, change of direction, and downhill pressure. Ideal for point guards.

drills.name: Anchored Steps
drills.description: Emphasizes maintaining anchor foot while changing direction.

drills.name: Half Spins
drills.description: Improves half-spin footwork and ball protection during turns.

drills.name: Inverted Drags
drills.description: Teaches planting and dragging footwork to change direction.

drills.name: Low Crossovers
drills.description: Builds tight, low, controlled crossovers to protect the basketball.

drills.name: Punch Drag, Behind the Back
drills.description: Combines punch dribble with behind-the-back move for balance and rhythm.

drills.name: Punch Drag, Through the Legs
drills.description: Adds between-the-legs variation to punch drag technique.

drills.name: Skip Step, Behind the Back
drills.description: Incorporates skip steps with behind-the-back transitions.

drills.name: Skip Step, Through the Legs
drills.description: Skip step footwork linked to through-the-legs dribble.

drills.name: Speed Stop, Exchange
drills.description: Teaches sudden stopping and quick hand exchanges into dribble attacks.
